document.discussion_title: Piper Jaffray Reaffirms Buy Rating for OceanFirst Financial Corp. (OCFC)
document.topic_text: Tweet OceanFirst Financial Corp. (NASDAQ:OCFC) ‘s stock had its “buy” rating restated by equities research analysts at Piper Jaffray in a report released on Monday, AnalystRatings.Net reports. OceanFirst Financial Corp. ( NASDAQ:OCFC ) traded up 0.05% during mid-day trading on Monday, reaching $18.42. 14,320 shares of the company’s stock were exchanged. The stock has a 50-day moving average price of $17.70 and a 200 day moving average price of $18.36. The company has a market cap of $310.69 million and a PE ratio of 15.22. OceanFirst Financial Corp. has a 52-week low of $15.98 and a 52-week high of $21.00. OceanFirst Financial Corp. (NASDAQ:OCFC) last released its quarterly earnings data on Thursday, April 21st. The company reported $0.25 earnings per share for the quarter, missing the consensus estimate of $0.33 by $0.08. Equities analysts predict that OceanFirst Financial Corp. will post $1.17 earnings per share for the current fiscal year. Several hedge funds and institutional investors have recently added to or reduced their stakes in the stock. Emerald Mutual Fund Advisers Trust purchased a new position in OceanFirst Financial Corp. during the fourth quarter worth approximately $1,831,000. Wedge Capital Management L L P NC boosted its position in OceanFirst Financial Corp. by 68.1% in the fourth quarter. Wedge Capital Management L L P NC now owns 115,570 shares of the company’s stock worth $2,315,000 after buying an additional 46,820 shares during the last quarter. Victory Capital Management Inc. boosted its position in OceanFirst Financial Corp. by 15.9% in the fourth quarter. Victory Capital Management Inc. now owns 53,225 shares of the company’s stock worth $1,066,000 after buying an additional 7,290 shares during the last quarter. Dimensional Fund Advisors LP boosted its position in OceanFirst Financial Corp. by 2.8% in the fourth quarter. Dimensional Fund Advisors LP now owns 617,749 shares of the company’s stock worth $12,374,000 after buying an additional 16,692 shares during the last quarter. Finally, Foresters Investment Management Company Inc. boosted its position in OceanFirst Financial Corp. by 1.3% in the fourth quarter. Foresters Investment Management Company Inc. now owns 234,500 shares of the company’s stock worth $4,697,000 after buying an additional 3,000 shares during the last quarter. OCFC has been the subject of several other research reports. Keefe, Bruyette & Woods reiterated a “buy” rating on shares of OceanFirst Financial Corp. in a report on Friday, January 8th. Zacks Investment Research cut OceanFirst Financial Corp. from a “hold” rating to a “sell” rating in a report on Wednesday, March 16th. OceanFirst Financial Corp. is a holding company for OceanFirst Bank ( NASDAQ:OCFC ). The Company is a savings and loan holding company. The Bank’s principal business is attracting retail and business deposits in the communities surrounding its branch offices and investing those deposits primarily in loans, consisting of single-family, owner-occupied residential mortgage loans, and commercial real estate and other commercial loans. Receive News & Ratings for OceanFirst Financial Corp. OceanFirst Financial Corp.
